name: Adrift in the Backrooms
description:
Adrift in the Backrooms is online co-op adventure game up to 4 players where you and your friends explore, solve puzzles and try to find your way out. It takes some elements from the backrooms, but as a whole it's designed to offer a new experience for players. It's a refreshing mix of backrooms and more traditional horror/adventure games.

Levels
Explore 10 unique levels that each offer something different

Entities
Encounter many entities that all behave differently

Puzzles
Complete puzzles troughout the game

1-4 Player co-op
Take your friends with you on a jorney to the backrooms
